texts.name: Kevin
texts.text: Jin! It's good to see you.

texts.name: Kevin
texts.text: I was doing inspections on your apartment today and noticed nobody was home.

texts.name: Kevin
texts.text: I know you were on a trip, but where was Allie?

texts.name: Kevin
texts.text: She should have been here, you guys know I do inspections.
texts.thought: They're usually fine on inspections. Whatever, I get to charge more!

choices.text: Don't you usually text us in advance?
I just got back, please don't do this to me.
choices.wrongAnswer: Couldn't do them anyways, nobody was home.
